channel.title: Last citizen
channel.description:
A series of programs devoted to exploring the problems facing African-Americans and how these issues impact all Americans.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Changing image, part two
item.description: This program, the second of two parts, discusses the ways in which white views on African Americans have changed over time, as well as how they have persisted.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: United States--Race relations

item.title: Color and race
item.description: This program explores issues of race and skin color and their importance in the United States.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: U.S. History (1900-present)

item.title: City and the worker
item.description: This program focuses on employment issues effecting African Americans at the midpoint of the 20th century.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: U.S. History (1900-present)

item.title: Prejudice
item.description: This program explores prejudices against African Americans in the United States in the mid-20th century.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: U.S. History (1900-present)

item.title: Defense
item.description: This program focuses on the various groups that have come together to defend the rights and welfare of African-Americans.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: U.S. Politics

item.title: Introduction
item.description: This program presents an introduction to the series.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: U.S. History (1900-present)

item.title: Changing image, part one
item.description: This program, the first of two parts, discusses the ways in which white views on African Americans have changed over time, as well as how they have persisted.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: United States--Race relations

item.title: Color and race
item.description: This program explores issues of race and skin color and their importance in the United States.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: U.S. History (1900-present)

item.title: The present and the future
item.description: This program assesses the present for African Americans, as well as the possibilities for the future.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: U.S. History (1900-present)

item.title: The city and crime
item.description: This program focuses on African Americans, urban environments, and crime.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: U.S. History (1900-present)

item.title: Migration and urbanization
item.description: This program focuses on African Americans and issues of migration and urbanization.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: U.S. History (1900-present)

item.title: Protest
item.description: This program focuses on the history of protest in African American culture.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: U.S. History (1900-present)

item.title: The second school house, part one
item.description: This program, the first of two parts, explores the state of education for African Americans.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: Vocational education

item.title: Churches, religious life, and church activities
item.description: This program focuses on the African American community and religion.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: U.S. History (1900-present)

item.title: The second school house, part two
item.description: This program, the second of two parts, explores the state of education for African Americans.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: Vocational education

item.title: Intimidation
item.description: This program focuses on the ways that whites use intimidation to subjugate African Americans in mid-20th century America.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: United States--Race relations--20th century

item.title: Journalism and art
item.description: This program focuses on African American journalism and art.
item.dc:creator: Schneider, Louis
item.dc:subject: U.S. History (1900-present)
